messages.pass: Elements with the name "{{=it.data.name}}" have both a shared label, and a unique label, referenced through aria-labelledby
messages.fail: {{var code = it.data && it.data.failureCode;}}Elements with the name "{{=it.data.name}}" do not all have {{? code === 'no-shared-label' }}a shared label{{?? code === 'no-unique-label' }}a unique label{{??}}both a shared label, and a unique label{{?}}, referenced through aria-labelledby
